page.title: 02Industry
page.content: As part of the project we have to investigate a topic of special interest in our area.We decided to look closely at the industrial estate just north of the ring road.We wanted to know just how many companies and businesses were there,what each did and how many people were employed.So we devised a questionnaire and visited every company.The questionnare basically tried to outline what the company does,how many people it employs and how long it has been in its location but in some cases various other matters were considered.Here are some samples of the questions we asked:- 1.Do you produce anything? 2.How many employees are there? 3.How long have you been here? 4.What was the building used for before?
